fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- You may Disguise yourself as any role in the day.
- Scramble any investigative results that another player receives tonight, causing them to provide completely random results. (2 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Basic Defense
- Your Disguises will last until they get replaced by any other Disguise, including from other players.

fields.name: Upgrade:
fields.value:
- You can now use your Disguise ability on any player.
- Players you Disguise gain 1 use Basic Defense.
